Create a user registration and login system for women to access the health survey
Design a dashboard for users to view available health surveys and their submission status
Implement a multi-page health survey form with various question types (text, multiple choice, checkboxes, dropdowns)
Add real-time form validation to ensure required fields are completed before submission
Include a save draft functionality allowing users to pause and resume survey completion
Build a survey submission confirmation system with unique reference numbers
Develop an admin portal for data management including viewing, editing, and deleting submitted surveys
Implement role-based permission management system with different access levels for users and administrators
Create data review functionality for authorized personnel to verify and approve submitted health information
Design reporting dashboard with visual charts and exportable summary statistics
Set up secure data storage system for collected health information with encryption
Implement responsive web design compatible with desktop and mobile devices
Apply whitesmoke background color and dark cyan component styling throughout the application
Include user profile management section for personal information and survey history
Add audit trail functionality to track data access and modifications by authorized users
